channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Register today for the Microsoft Entra Suite Summer Camp
item.description: This summer, we’re inviting security leaders and identity and network professionals to join us for a week of webinars designed to get a hands-on look at the latest innovations in the Microsoft Entra Suite. The Microsoft Entra Suite Summer Camp is your opportunity to explore what’s new across the Suite—including product updates we will be announcing that week—and see how to deploy them in real-world scenarios. Each session will highlight new features, live demos and an expert campfire Q&A to help you move from planning to deployment with ease. Register now for the Microsoft Entra Suite Summer C...
